explains: adj. 天真的；睁大眼睛的；吃惊的

sentences.en: She stared at him in wide-eyed amazement.
sentences.cn: 她睁大眼睛惊讶地注视着他。

sentences.en: This generation has lost a lot of its wide-eyed innocence.
sentences.cn: 这代人已经失去了许多单纯和天真的品质。

sentences.en: Her wide-eyed innocence soon exposes the pretensions of the art world.
sentences.cn: 她的天真无邪很快就暴露出艺术界的做作。
